summary: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.
cast: Kurt Russell|James Spader|Jaye Davidson|Viveca Lindfors|Alexis Cruz|Mili Avital|Leon Rippy|John Diehl|Carlos Lauchu|Djimon Hounsou|Erick Avari|French Stewart|Gianin Loffler|Christopher John Fields|Derek Webster|Jack Moore|Steve Giannelli|David Pressman|Scott Alan Smith|Cecil Hoffman|Rae Allen|Richard Kind|John Storey|Lee Taylor-Allan|George Gray|Kelly Vint Castro|Erik Holland|Nick Wilder|Sayed Badreya|Michael Concepcion|Jerry Gilmore|Michel Jean-Philippe|Dialy N'Daiye|Gladys Holland|Roger Til|Kenneth Danziger|Christopher West|Robert Ackerman|Kairon John|Dax Biagas|Frank Welker|Joseph Olea|Tim Sauer|Phillip L. Tomalin Jr.|Kit West
title: Stargate
